Using the ICMS app the employee will give attendance by clicking two pictures. One is selfie and the other is shoefie. The pictures must be clear and in proper way as instructed. You can also ask //attendance from office// or //attendance outside of office//

patterns: How to give attendance from office
responses: Those who will be present in the office and will be on duty: Those employees must be present in the office of Alchemy Software Limited and pay the attendance. Attendance in front of the elevator, under the office or from any other place will be considered as breaking the office rules.

patterns: How to give attendance from outside?
When do I get my delivery?
responses: Those who will provide attendance from outside the office: If any person pays attendance from outside the office, he / she must specify the day before by entering in detail where he / she should be in the apps subject to his / her prior prior permission. And the details / pictures of the place should be mentioned at the time of his attendance and the picture should be taken at the time of attendance in such a way that the location of the place can be seen on the signboard.
If an employee delays up to 15 minutes from the start of office hours, it will not be considered as delay. But if he joins in the delay from the next minute, it will be treated as a delay.

patterns: What if the app doesn't work
responses: If the app doesn't work inform immediately to the seniors and give an email with a screenshot mentioning the problem.
Those who will provide exit attendance from the office:  In this case, you must pay exit attendance from inside the office.
If an employee has to leave the office for the sake of work, he / she must give an exit attendance stating why he / she should leave the office or place.

Any rule violation of attendance will charge fine from salary and office may take any kind of severe punishment for the same kind of repetition. If there is a delay of three days in any month, one day's salary will be deducted for those three days. If exit attendance is given in front of the elevator, under the office or intentionally showing extra time from any other place, a fine of Tk. 50 will be charged for that day.

patterns: How many working days in a week?
responses: Generally Saturday to Thursday is considered working day and Friday is considered off day for all employees.10 am to 6 pm will be treated as an employee's duty time. There is a probable time for each job according to the ongoing work experience of the office. According to him, if any employee performs the work, it is considered normal. But if an employee fails to perform the work assigned to him on time, then he may have to work even after the period of duty.
A mobile app, provided by Alchemy Software Limited, by which an employee can easily update his/her daily work information and submit his/her attendance and more.

All employees are required to provide information on all day-to-day activities and out-of-office attendance, starting from their attendance, using the ICMS apps provided by the office during office duty.

responses: ICMS apps have arrangements for applying for leave in advance.
